Key Match Events: Pakistan defeated Afghanistan by one wicket in their Super 4 match of Asia Cup at Sharjah Stadium.
Naseem Shah hit back-to-back sixes to win the match for Pakistan.
Shadab Khan top-scored for Pakistan with 36 runs off 26 balls.
Babar Azam was dismissed for a golden duck.
Fazalhaq Farooqi and Fareed Ahmad took three wickets each for Afghanistan.
Rashid Khan bagged two dismissals for Afghanistan.
Ibrahim Zadran scored 35 runs off 27 balls for Afghanistan.
Haris Rauf took two wickets for Pakistan.
Pre-Game Insights: Mohammad Nabi mentioned the difficulty of playing against Pakistan and the impact of dew on the game.
Babar Azam emphasized the importance of early wickets and maintaining a cool and calm mood.
